name: Richly jeweled pearl bangles
data: It increases the users constitution adequately.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It has average armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
The bangles conduct and convert magical energy.
